lender.name: Sheena
lender.loan_because: It feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I make maps.

lender.name: Ana Maria
lender.loan_because: Little by little together we can make it better for all.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: Everyone who enrolls in the Kiva program should feel a sense of pride in helping those that are truly making a different in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I care for people who seek emergent medical attention.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Kiva can be likened to an Australian story called "The Magic Pudding" in which the pudding, no matter how often it is eaten, always reforms in order to be eaten again.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: A loan makes a great gift while filling a need as well.

lender.name: eliterate
lender.loan_because: We loan to Kiva the money we used to spend on client gifts and supporting charities.
lender.occupational_info: We work in the advertising and marketing industry, helping people communicate online.

lender.name: jhabinsk
lender.loan_because: I never have to worry about the basic necessities of life. I am, by any standard I care to recognize, rich. Others need this money more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: Future student of Veterinary Medicine

lender.name: RAVI
lender.loan_because: A little help gives a great support to needy to survive.
lender.occupational_info: I am a common man and with my other fellow members help out community as much as we can.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Everyone should lend a hand to those in need.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.occupational_info: I fix aircraft parts

lender.name: Pag
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: Economic Regulation

lender.name: Howe
lender.loan_because: we all deserve a chance.
lender.occupational_info: love. awareness. laughter.

lender.name: PatMeli
lender.loan_because: Jesus gave so much to us and we feel responsible to share those blessings with others.

lender.name: Jenny H
lender.loan_because: I can't do it alone, but here we can help the world.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I can. It's as simple as that. I feel life has little meaning if I can't help others, especially those less fortunate who need our help to achieve better things for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a big, busy city hospital on a surgical ward. A lot of my patients have cancer, all have pain. I help them get better and move forward.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. I work on campus as well as with the youth at my local church.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: Helping people save for their retirement, mainly with corporate sponsored retirement plans.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: Micro-loans can be an incredible resource to fight global poverty. It's very easy and a great thing to do for a fellow human being.

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: I can..and I should :-)
lender.occupational_info: I work at a University and I help students learn...how to learn!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. Entrepreneurs helped me get started in business and we quite often need financial assistance in establishing a new business.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a small finance and real estate brokerage in the city of Brisbane.

lender.name: Craig and Cynthia
lender.loan_because: Those who have should help those who have not.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good way to help others in a positive and constructive way.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work in computer software, but now I spend much of my time working on and sailing boats.

lender.name: Mickey
lender.loan_because: I was helped by my aunt when I was broke. When I tried to repay her, she said, "No, pass it on to someone else." Each time I follow her wishes, I am reminded my aunt's gift - an act of hope, love and trust. That is a good feeling.
lender.occupational_info: I taught children and young adults about living things in the world. I tried to make it interesting, useful and fun. I expected them to learn. Now I'm retired from teaching and try to help others when I can.

lender.name: Mike Bolitho
lender.loan_because: To help others to improve their lives

lender.name: Angelique
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with an opportunity to start and create my own small business and inturn would like to help others do the same who are less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: My on line Business was created to sell products that assist the development of children through all stages of the life. And so they have an opportunity to reach their full potential.

lender.name: Bjorn
lender.loan_because: I makes me feel I am doing something useful with my money!

lender.name: Anthony Cousins
lender.loan_because: Its a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I sell houses

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: I started my own business from scratch ,and I want to help other people across the world have the same opportunity!

lender.name: Daryl & Susan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I want to support those who want to change their lives and build their communities

lender.name: Ingrid Odilia
lender.loan_because: I have no reason not to loan

lender.name: Kasper
lender.loan_because: My company and I want to help alleviate poverty. I enjoy being able to help small entrepreneurs be succesful with their project and through this increase their quality of life!

lender.name: Loek
lender.loan_because: If we can all help someone to get an equal chance in this world, someday the world may turn out not to be a bad place at all!
lender.occupational_info: Credit Analyst for clients with an exposure of EUR 5 mio or higher of Deutsche Bank in the Netherlands.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: Hopefully my small contributions will enable someone realise their goals.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I am part of a school project and want to learn more about economics!

lender.name: Systema Consulting Srl
lender.loan_because: Systema Consulting crede in una visione del mondo dove ogni persona ha un senso di valore e, avendo la capacit di essere produttiva, accetta la responsabilit per s, la propria famiglia e la comunit per contribuire a costruire una societ sana. Crede inoltre che il businnes uno dei driver pi potenti per un vero cambiamento sociale, cos come una forza importante nella lotta contro la disuguaglianza e la povert. A questo scopo ci siamo impegnati nel progetto "L'Impresa dei Mille. Il progetto prevede il sostegno, tramite il microcredito di KIVA, a 1000 piccoli imprenditori delle aree sottosviluppate del pianeta.
lender.occupational_info: Consulenza e formazione alle imprese sui temi della Qualit, dell'Ambiente e della Sicurezza.

lender.name: Aloja GmbH
lender.loan_because: Instead of sending christmas cards to our customers we start an account at kiva.org and will reinvest the money that is payed back in the future

lender.name: Torsten Maue
lender.loan_because: Ich mchte damit meinen kleinen Anteil daran leisten, da es auch anderen Menschen einmal so gut geht wie es mir geht. Jeder hat das Recht darauf, da er menschenwrdig leben kann.
lender.occupational_info: Ich bin Suchmaschinenoptimierer und Social Media Marketing-Spezialist und habe eine eigene Agentur in Magdeburg.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I'm learning to be human.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It makes sense and it makes a sustainable difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help small business owners attract clients and grow their businesses.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I like the feeling of being part of a world community and feel that as such we should all be able to support one another when we are in a position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a holistic health practitioner, I use nutrition, natural products and techniques to help people heal themselves.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Christmas of 2009, my generous employers provided each employee with $100 to donate to the charity of our choice. After doing some research, I decided to become involved with Kiva because I believe that efforts like this can have a real impact on global poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying law to become an attorney. Prior to law school, I worked for a company that teaches people how to use the software programs on their computers.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I think we all should if we can.

lender.name: One mom
lender.loan_because: I can. And I believe individual to individual assistance is far more effective and less corrupt than government confiscations and transfers of wealth.
lender.occupational_info: Analytics over large data during the day. Laundry and dishes at night!

lender.name: Doyle Family
lender.occupational_info: In December 2009, Rob, Nina, Andrew, Madeline, & Sophie will be traveling to Peru. We know we are going to have a fantastic time taking in this wonderful culture, so our first loan is in advance gratitude for this amazing experience. We think it is very important to empower people to make the best possible lives for themselves, especially all these hardworking people. Thank you Kiva for giving us the opportunity to do this! Happy Holidays everyone!
